text: (Bare he sanga) akasanna ani jaminila koni nirmana kele? Koni akasatuna pa'usa padala? Maga tyadvare hiravya tavatavita sundara baga koni ugavilya? Ya bagance vrksa tumhi kadhihi ugavu sakata nahi. Kaya allahakherija dusara koni upasana karanyayogya ahe? Kimbahuna he loka (sarala margapasuna) dura hotata
